member.name: P:TravelBook.AppResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TravelBook.AppResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to LeftToRight.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to us-EN.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to MY APPLICATION.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to button.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Menu Item.

member.name: T:TravelBook.AppResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
